github_issue.title: 🚨 Security Alert: 3 Critical Issues Found (3 total findings)

security_fix_pr.title: 🔒 Security: Addressed critical security vulnerabilities involving command injection, SSL verification, and unsafe deserialization

analysis_summary: The security scan revealed multiple critical vulnerabilities in the Python application, including OS command injection, insecure certificate validation, and unsafe deserialization techniques. These issues expose the application to potential remote code execution and data manipulation risks.
